tasks.label: Run ReactPrj
tasks.command: if [ ! -f ${workspaceFolder}/node_modules/@sap/html5-repo-mock/index.js ] || [ ! -f ${workspaceFolder}/node_modules/@sap/approuter/approuter.js ]; then npm i @sap/approuter && npm i @sap/html5-repo-mock; fi

tasks.label: Build ReactPrj
tasks.command: if [ ! -d ${workspaceFolder}/app/build ]; then npm run build-app; fi
